I believe it's worth every penny and more, considering its quality and benefits. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $135. This price not only ensures you get the best value for your investment but also allows me to maintain the integrity of the product's pricing strategy. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the excellence firsthand. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $135. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $135
(2) Reject Alice's offer
